title: Sun Bum SPF 30 Sunscreen Lip Balm | Vegan and Cruelty Free Broad Spectrum UVA/UVB Lip Care with Aloe and Vitamin E for Moisturized Lips | Variety Pack |0.15 Ounce (Pack of 3)
description: Grab as many as you can because we literally can't keep any of our lip balm flavors in stock. Our smooth SPF 30 sunscreen lip balm with added Aloe and Vitamin E will protect and moisturize your kisser all day long... just try not to lick it off. Feel good knowing that our lip balm is Hypoallergenic and Vegan and made with ingredients that will not irritate your lips.
